name: Persevere
description:
Controls: 

A and D or arrow keys to move. 

Mouse to interact on button near end of game.

A very short 2-D game revolving around depression and hope. This is for the "I Can't Write But Want To Tell A Story" gamejam!

(This is also my first real game made with Unity and I did all of the assets myself though the pixel art is very beginner. Some bugs are being worked on though I may not have enough time and I know some parts are very sketchy like the background and camera color being shown towards the end. I tried my best and have learned a lot on what to do better!) 

Thanks for playing!!
